name: What Would You Do? (itch) (DamonAskavio)
description:
You took a dump. You realized you've run out of toilet paper. Not only that, the door is locked shut from the outside, the premise is about to close down and.... your leg is chained to the ground. What would you do?

Note: This is still a WIP/Demo, please be gentle on me >_>

Note2: Install the UE4PrereqSetup file if you receive any errors regarding missing components. The file can be located under /Engine/Extras/Redist or downloaded separately below if you can't find it.

Thank you~
